statements: SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM SavingsPlanTransactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE user_id = 'abc123' AND amount > 100.0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE user_id = 'xyz789' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM SavingsPlanTransactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50.0 AND 200.0 AND user_id IN ('abc123', 'xyz789') ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions;
SELECT account_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM SavingsPlanAccounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM SavingsPlanAccounts WHERE open_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM SavingsPlanTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, account_name, open_date FROM SavingsPlanAccounts WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY open_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT account_id, account_name, open_date, balance FROM SavingsPlanAccounts WHERE open_date >= '2022-01-01' AND open_date <= '2022-06-30' AND balance <= 10000 ORDER BY balance ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT t.transaction_id, a.account_name, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_amount FROM SavingsPlanTransactions t JOIN SavingsPlanAccounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 500 AND a.balance > 3000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM TransactionDetails;
SELECT account_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM TransactionDetails ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionDetails GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM AccountDetails WHERE account_type='Savings';
SELECT savings_plan_id, start_date, savings_amount FROM SavingsPlanDetails WHERE savings_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM TransactionDetails WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, transaction_amount FROM AccountDetails JOIN TransactionDetails ON AccountDetails.account_id = TransactionDetails.account_id WHERE TransactionDetails.transaction_amount > 2000;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount, account_type FROM AccountDetails JOIN TransactionDetails ON AccountDetails.account_id = TransactionDetails.account_id GROUP BY account_type;
SELECT account_id, SUM(savings_amount) AS total_savings FROM SavingsPlanDetails GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_savings > 5000 ORDER BY total_savings DESC;

SELECT account_name, savings_amount AS total_savings FROM AccountDetails JOIN SavingsPlanDetails ON AccountDetails.account_id = SavingsPlanDetails.account_id WHERE savings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_savings DESC;
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date FROM Savings_Plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT plan_id, MAX(created_date) FROM Plan_Details GROUP BY plan_id;
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM Savings_Plans WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2002;
SELECT plan_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Savings_Plans INNER JOIN Transactions ON Savings_Plans.plan_id = Transactions.plan_id;
SELECT customer_name, detail_description, created_date FROM Customers INNER JOIN Plan_Details ON Customers.customer_id = Plan_Details.plan_id ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, amount, start_date FROM Savings_Plans WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer_Details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM Plan_Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM Transaction_Logs WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer_Details WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM Plan_Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM Transaction_Logs ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT index_id, table_name, column_name, index_type FROM Indices WHERE index_type = 'PRIMARY KEY';
